title: Adobe Dreamweaver CC 2015 (v16.1.2) x86-x64 RUS-ENG Update 3 by
description:
[b]Adobe Dreamweaver CC 2015 (v16.1.2) x86-x64 RUS/ENG Update 3[/b]

[img]https://s19.postimg.org/udljb861v/0_1e757c_e5df437c_orig.jpg[/img]

[b]Adobe Dreamweaver CC 2015 (v16.1.2) x86-x64 RUS/ENG Update 3
                                (C)
                           www.adobe.com 


       SUPPLiER.......: m0nkrus     RELEASE DATE....: 04/09/16
       CREATiON.......: m0nkrus     RELEASE TYPE....: AIO Distr
       TESTER.........: m0nkrus     PROTECTiON......: Keygen+Patch 


                     ... RELEASE iNFORMATiON ... 


Adobe Dreamweaver CC 2015 (v16.1.2) x86-x64 RUS/ENG Update 3 contains
      russian and english versions of Adobe Dreamweaver CC 2015
                   for 32bit(x86) and 64bit(x64).


                       ... iNSTALL iNFO ...


  1.) Disable your Network card or pull the network cable.

  2.) Execute Check_Disable.cmd (double click on it) 
      (in Vista or Win7/8.x/10, run it as admin if you have UAC enabled)

      Or do it manually 
      Add the text below to the bottom of your hosts file. 
      (The host file is located C:windowssystem32driversetchosts)

      # Adobe Blocker
      127.0.0.1 activate.adobe.com
      127.0.0.1 practivate.adobe.com
      127.0.0.1 lmlicenses.wip4.adobe.com
      127.0.0.1 lm.licenses.adobe.com
      127.0.0.1 na1r.services.adobe.com
      127.0.0.1 hlrcv.stage.adobe.com

  3.) Install the Adobe Dreamweaver CC 2015 with a serial generated from
      keymaker Activation_Keygen.exe.
      Save the serial number! It will be used later. When the error
      "Please connect to the internet and retry" shows click connect later.

  4.) Launch an Adobe Dreamweaver CC 2015.

  5.) Confirm you have "connection problem" and you want it to activate
      offline.

  6.) A request code will be generated. Use Activation_Keygen.exe with
      the serial generated previously to generate your activation code.

  7.) After it has been activated re-enable you Network card and run the
      adobe updater to update your software to the latest version.

  8.) Enjoy!


  Note: If you encounter any issues with a previous installation / crack,
  please uninstall Adobe Dreamweaver CC 2015 and delete those folders:

  C:Program Files (x86)Common FilesAdobeSLCache
  C:ProgramDataAdobeSLStore[/b]
